repairedDockerfile:
FROM node:8.9.4-alpine 

## Install AWS CLI. 
RUN \
 mkdir -p /aws && \  
apk -Uuv add groff less python py-pip && \
 pip install --no-cache-dir awscli && \
apk --purge -v del py-pip && \
rm /var/cache/apk/*

## Install Serverless 
WORKDIR /app 
RUN npm -g install serverless && npm cache clean --force;
